column2: aletheridge, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: While Endep has helped with my headaches - sadly it is causing me bad stomach pains, heart flutterings, dizziness and lethargy. I've been on them for a week and these effects are getting worse.However, I do have a history of problem reactions to anti-depressants.

column2: Lyn, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Having had PMR and lots of sweating each day for 4 years I was overjoyed that after only 3 nights taking 2 Endep Tabs I had no more sweating. It has been approx 4 months now and I have not had the sweats. I am also sleeping better!

column1: Disorder characterized by Stiff, Tender &amp; Painful Muscles
column2: Lyn, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have Polymyalgia Rheumatica and along with  muscle pain and fatigue, the sweating was really bothersome and uncontrolled!After 4 nights of Endep I felt as if a weight had been removed from my shoulders and I have not had the Sweats.... now in my 4th week!!

column9: I've been prescribed Endep for insomnia, and have found that is does not help me sleep and just results in feeling withdrawn and spaced out.
